data.name: Twilight Monk
data.detailed_description:
Designed for fans of classic 2D games of the past, with modern art.



Twilight Monk is a fantasy, kung fu adventure with meticulously crafted Metroidvania designed dungeons, connected by an open world.

In Twilight Monk, you will hunt down and destroy or subdue powerful Darksprites as Raziel Tenza - the last descendant of a race of Demon Hunters.


Weapon of the Ancients - Rack up combos with the Phantom Pillar to obliterate your foes.



Solve puzzles - As you explore, you will need to use a variety of tools to reach previously inaccessible areas and solve puzzles.


Living towns - Switch to a 3/4 angled world view between dungeons to explore towns and stock up on equipment, make some bets or discover new dungeons!


  • You choose your path - Choose to destroy or recruit Darksprite foes.
  • Discover maps to hidden, new dungeons spread across the land.
  • Meet a unconventional cast of unusual characters, each with their own story.

The Catacombs beneath Crescent Isle hold many secrets.
Unspoken story details in the environments immerse you an imaginative world, on the brink of destruction.


Stay on guard! Creatures will jump out at you from the darkness!


A vast world - Explore an engaging story spanning across multiple continents.




An immersive world based on the series of Illustrated novels.

data.short_description: Explore the shattered world of Speria as the last remnant of ancient Kung Fu warriors in Twilight Monk! Destroy demons, or enslave them as you hunt down and obliterate the portals from whence they came. In Twilight Monk, you will explore Metroidvania dungeons connected by an open world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

data.legal_notice: Twilight Monk and all associated art and story are copyright and Trademark Trent Kaniuga 2022
